actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to provide annuity benefits under the military Survivor Benefit Plan to the surviving spouses of military retirees who died before September 21, 1972, but after their discharge or release from active duty.

summary.text: Amends the Uniformed Survivors Benefits Amendments of 1980 to entitle certain individuals who were widowed on or before September 21, 1972, and who are not covered by the Survivor Benefit Plan, to an annuity.

titles.title: A bill to provide annuity benefits under the military Survivor Benefit Plan to the surviving spouses of military retirees who died before September 21, 1972, but after their discharge or release from active duty.
